pr_title: Add NestedPathFieldMapper to store nested path information

timeline.message: Add new NestedPathFieldMapper, migrate nested docs to use it rather than type field
Don't add nested field mapper for pre-8 indexes, as this breaks mapping updates due to the _type field being overloaded
test different built-in mapper counts on different versions
Adjust isMetaDataField test to take version into account

timeline.bodyText: should we disallow fielddata on this field ? It's an implementation details and I am not sure that we want to expose it in aggs or sorting ?
timeline.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: Maybe keep it only for indices created before 8 to handle bwc ?
replies.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: I'll remove it - indices created before 8 still use TypeFieldMapper, so BWC is handled that way
replies.author: romseygeek

timeline.bodyText: Can you switch to the NestedPathFieldMapper.TypeParser in this pr since you handle bwc in the new field type ?
timeline.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: We may be able to in future, but I think we need to keep TypeFieldMapper around for the moment because it's still used for type queries, etc.
replies.author: romseygeek

replies.bodyText: Ok I was confused because there are some logic to handle bwc in NestedPathFieldMapper.
